text: Franco Foda (born 23 April 1966) is a German football player and manager. ==Career== Foda played in over 400 matches in the highest leagues in Germany (1. FC Kaiserslautern, Arminia Bielefeld, 1. FC Saarbrücken, Bayer Leverkusen and VfB Stuttgart), Switzerland (FC Basel) and Austria (Sturm Graz). Rsssf:Franco Foda He also played for the U21 and the A-national team of West Germany. ==Coaching record== Team From To Record Sturm Graz 20 September 2002 4 June 2003 Sturm Graz II 4 June 2003 1 June 2006 Sturm Graz 1 June 2006 12 April 2012 1\. FC Kaiserslautern 22 May 2012 29 August 2013 Sturm Graz 30 September 2014 1 January 2018 Austria 1 January 2018 29 March 2022 FC Zürich 8 June 2022 21 September 2022 Total ==Honours== ===Player=== 1\.
